name: Mochabot Organic
description:
"Good coffee, nice vibes!"
- coolraccoon

"Such a disappointment. My coffee tasted like wet socks! I want my socks dry. Avoid this place :("
- cool_jan02

In Mochabot Organic you take the role of a robotic barista and tend to the curious customers of your isometric establishment. Tend to your plants, harvest coffee beans, carefully prepare drinks, receive great reviews, and listen to the occasional gossip.

Currently available for Android. This game was created as a part of the #4 Pocket Jam Helsinki between 01-02. October 2019. Licensed under Creative Commons SA-NC-4.0.

Team:

  • Henri Sarasvirta, code
  • Christina Lassheikki, game design, concept, environment & character art, animation
  • Leo Krechmer, sound & music
  • Tuma Heinonen, game design and visuals, character art, mini game visuals
  • Virpi Väinölä, game design, UI & graphic design, character & prop art, animation
